results.content: I enjoyed working through this course, the first two sections were great for brushing up my html and css skills. PHP was a new skill for me, and i liked how thorough and detailed Terry was as he walked through each section of the lectures.
results.content_html: I enjoyed working through this course, the first two sections were great for brushing up my html and css skills. PHP was a new skill for me, and i liked how thorough and detailed Terry was as he walked through each section of the lectures.

results.content:
Terry is an exceptional teacher.  I have purchased three of his other courses.  He is very professional, and you can tell he puts in a lot of time prior to his recordings because his courses are very well structured.  I also see that he maintains all of his courses with constant edits anytime something may need a bit more clarification.

This particular course is a kickstart course for HTML, CSS, and PHP.  This means that it is an absolute beginner's course.  Do not expect to come away knowing everything about these tools.  You will walk away; however; with what Terry promises: a great foundation to begin your HTML, CSS, and PHP adventures.

My only criticism is that this course is a bit expensive considering it is a very basic introductory course to the subject matters.  It is very well worth it if you can buy it on discount.

Be sure to check out Terry's other courses, especially the one where he creates a user login system in PHP.  It is excellent.
